title: Transformer Model
description: A specific model for Transformers that derives from the generic Asset model. It extends the generic model by enforcing a 'type' object in the secondary attributes.
$comment: A Transformer must have as its first secondary attribute an object that conforms to the secondary attribute model and as its secondary a rating value. After that, any other data may be added.

secondaryAttributes.description: A set of specific attributes specific to Transformers
